text: Gwaun Troed-rhiw-seiri a Llyn Mynydd-gorddu is a Site of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion, west Wales. ==See also== *List of Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion Category:Sites of Special Scientific Interest in Ceredigion
title: Gwaun Troed-rhiw-seiri a Llyn Mynydd-gorddu
